Unmatched Trade Investigation Summary

This template can be used to communicate the high-level steps taken or procedures followed when investigating an unmatched trade.

Subject: Summary of [Trade Date] Unmatched Trade Investigation Procedure

Dear [Recipient Name/Team Name],

This email summarizes the six-step process followed by the Operations team when investigating the unmatched trade involving [Security Name/Ticker] for the Trade Date of [Trade Date].

Our goal is to quickly identify the discrepancy, resolve the trade, and document the root cause for future prevention.

Investigation Steps:

  • Identify and Log: We first recorded the core trade details (Security, Quantity, Price, Dates) and noted the reported reason for the unmatch to set the initial priority.
  • Verify Internally: Our team checked the internal booking system and the outgoing trade instruction/confirmation (e.g., SWIFT) to ensure our firm's records were accurate.
  • Contact Counterparty (CPTY): We communicated with [Counterparty Name] to determine the trade status on their side and obtained their specific details to isolate the exact point of discrepancy (e.g., Price, Quantity, Settlement Date).
  • Resolve Discrepancy: We agreed on the correct final trade details with the CPTY and executed the necessary corrective action (e.g., sending a corrected instruction).
  • Confirm Match: We verified that the corrective action successfully led to a match/affirmation in the relevant clearing or settlement utility.
  • Determine Root Cause: Finally, we documented the underlying reason for the error and are implementing preventative measures to stop its recurrence.

Status of Specific Trade (Optional):

  • Trade Reference: [Internal Trade ID]
  • Final Resolution: [e.g., Successfully Matched/Affirmed on T+1]
  • Root Cause Identified: [Briefly state the cause, e.g., Clerical error in quantity input.]

Please let me know if you require a detailed log of the action taken for this specific trade.

Best regards,

Capital Markets Investigation Team
